== Thrikkodithanam (CT) (628192) ==

Thrikkodithanam (CT) is a town in the [[Changanassery]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 11.44 sq. km. and harbouring 8395 households with total population of 33819 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 140 km. Male population is 16504 and female population is 17315. Scheduled Caste population is 3527 and Scheduled Tribes population is 99. Census Location Code of the town is 628192<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 50 km. Railway station is at Changanassery at a distance of 4 km.
